pullrequest.title: Adding xacro parameter to specify task name in plugin

content.raw: It looks like page 6 of our version 1.3 of the technical guide says the Dock task should be named `scan`. I think this is a typo and it should be `dock`. Shall I change it? And, if so, is it worth a new version number?
content.html: It looks like page 6 of our version 1.3 of the technical guide says the Dock task should be named scan. I think this is a typo and it should be dock. Shall I change it? And, if so, is it worth a new version number?
